public abstract int countMatches(List<ProximityPostingsReader.TermPosition> positions)

getNumberOfPostings

public int getNumberOfPostings()
Description copied from interface: PostingsReader
Returns the number of postings in this postings list. Note that this value may not be the same as the document frequency of the term (e.g., if this postings list contains only a partition of the entire collection).

Specified by:
getNumberOfPostings in interface PostingsReader

getPositions

public int[] getPositions()
Description copied from interface: PostingsReader
Returns an array of term positions corresponding to the current posting. This is an optional operation valid only for postings that store positional information.

Specified by:
getPositions in interface PostingsReader

public boolean hasMorePostings()
Description copied from interface: PostingsReader
Checks to see if there are any more postings to be read.

Specified by:
hasMorePostings in interface PostingsReader
Returns:
true if there are any more postings to be read, false otherwise

nextPosting

public boolean nextPosting(Posting posting)
Description copied from interface: PostingsReader
Reads the next posting, consuming it from the stream of postings.

Specified by:
nextPosting in interface PostingsReader
Parameters:

Returns:

peekNextDocno

public int peekNextDocno()
Description copied from interface: PostingsReader
Returns the docno of the next posting, without consuming it from the stream of postings. This is an optional operation.

Specified by:
peekNextDocno in interface PostingsReader

peekNextScore

public short peekNextScore()
Description copied from interface: PostingsReader
Returns the score of the next posting, without consuming it from the stream of postings. This is an optional operation.
